pr:DDIProfile:
CESSDA EQB_DDI32_PROFILE 0.1.1 Darren Bell - UKDA
CESSDA EUROPEAN QUESTION BANK (EQB) DDI3.2 PROFILE
1.0 3.2
ddi:codebook:3_2
xsi http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: No Usage: States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Must be 'Individual' or 'Organization' EQB_ID_Element: 11.2.1/documentationPublisherReferenceType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal reference) - associated with 'Metadata Provider'.
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Information on the copyright of the study documentation. EQB_ID_Element: 11.1/documentationCopyright EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'Copyright/String' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 11.1.1/documentationCopyrightLang EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Two use cases: (1) A value of a persistent identifier for the study group (mandatory). (2) An URL or URN (a reference to a web resource that specifies its location) linking to the study group (optional).
EQB_ID_Element: 7.2/studyGroupID; 7.4/studyGroupUrl EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
Required: Required: Mandatory if 'g:Group/r:UserID' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Two use cases as per r:UserID: (1) A required attribute containing the local user identification system that maintains and defines the UserID. Always 'GroupID'. (2) A required attribute containing the local user identification system that maintains and defines the UserID. Always 'URLServiceProvider'.
EQB_ID_Element: 7.2.1/studyGroupIDType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Two use cases: (1) States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Always 'StudyUnit' if referring to a Study.. (2) States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Always 'OtherMaterial' if referrring to a document.
EQB_ID_Element: 7.5.1/referenceGroupToStudyType; 7.5.1/referenceGroupToDocument EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A title or name for the study group. EQB_ID_Element: 7.3/studyGroupTitle EQB_UI_Label: Filter/Part of study group/series.
Required: Mandatory if ...r:Title/r:String is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 7.3.1/studyGroupTitleLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 7.3.2/studyGroupTitleTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A file name of the data set. EQB_ID_Element: 4.3/datasetFileName EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
Required: Mandatory if ...r:Title/r:String is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 4.3.1/datasetFileNameLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: An identifier that captures information on the type and value of a PID. For the associated r:ManagingAgency element, specify the identification of the agency which assigns and manages the identifier, i.e., ISBN, ISSN, DOI, etc. EQB_ID_Element: 4.2/datasetPID EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A name of the organization or institution. EQB_ID_Element: 9.2/institutionName EQB_UI_Label: Publisher
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if a:OrganizationIdentification/a:OrganizationName is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 9.2/1/institutionNameLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: If applicable - abbreviation of the institution's name. EQB_ID_Element: 9.3/institutionAbbreviation EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The first name of a person. EQB_ID_Element: distStmt/distrbtr.1/firstName EQB_UI_Label: Publisher.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The middle name of a person. EQB_ID_Element: 8.2.2/middleName EQB_UI_Label: Publisher.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The last name of a person. EQB_ID_Element: 8.2.3/lastName EQB_UI_Label: Publisher.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Always 'Individual'. EQB_ID_Element: 8.3.1.1/sourceObjectReferenceType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Identifies the target organization or individual in the relationship. Always 'Affiliation'. EQB_ID_Element: 8.3.1.1/targetObjectRole EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Always 'Organization'. EQB_ID_Element: 8.3.3.1/targetObjectReferenceType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).

Required: Mandatory if '..c:ConceptName/r:String' is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 3.2.1/conceptNameLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>

EQB_ID_Element: 3.3.1/conceptLabelLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)

<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'd:InstructionText/d:LiteralText' is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used

<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.7.2/questionItemInterviewerinstructionTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A prequestion and/or postquestion and other statements as part of the question item text. EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.6/questionItemStatement EQB_UI_Label: Pre-/Post-question text
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'd:StatementItem/d:DisplayText/d:LiteralText/d:Text' is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.6.1/questionItemStatementLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.6.1/questionItemStatemenTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element Usage: Top level sequence, to be referenced from Instrument. In this context, r:TypeOfObject='Sequence' This top level sequence holds to one or more d:ControlConstructScheme/d:Sequence elements (one per question), each of refers to (1) a QuestionConstruct (d:ControlConstructReference/r:TypeOfObject='QuestionConstruct') which itself refers to a QuestionItem or QuestionGrid and (2)an optional Statement where d:ControlConstructReference/r:TypeOfObject='StatementItem'.
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1/QuestionItem; 1.2 QuestionGrid EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element Usage: Either 'QuestionGrid' or 'QuestionItem', depending on whether this is a refernce to Question item or Question Grid. In summary: to get from Instrument to Question, you have to follow: -reference to TopLevelSequence -has reference to Sequence (for each question there is 1) -has reference to QuestionConstruct -has reference to QuestionGrid or QuestionItem
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1/QuestionItem; 1.2 QuestionGrid EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: An identifier provided by the user for the question. EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.3/questionItemID EQB_UI_Label: Question ID
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..d:QuestionItem/r:UserID' is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: Type of UserID for question. Always 'QuestionID'. EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.3.1/questionItemIDType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..d:QuestionItem/d:QuestionItemName' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Two use cases: (1) Identify the context related to the question item name, in this case to separate between number and label for example.. Examples: examples: 'title-english', 'title-originallang' (2) Identify the context related to the question item name, in this case to separate between number and label for example.Always 'questionNumber'.
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.4.1/questionItemNameCon; 1.1.8.1/questionItemNumberCon EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Two use cases: (1) A label of a question item the metadata refers to for display. (2) A number of the question item the metadata refers to within the associated instrument.
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.4/questionItemName; 1.1.8/questionItemNumber EQB_UI_Label: Name; Question number
Required: Mandatory if '..d:QuestionItemName/r:String/' element is present. ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.4.2/questionItemNameLang; 1.1.8.2/questionItemNumberLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.4.3/questionItemNameTrans; 1.1.8.3/questionItemNumberTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A literal question item text. EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.5/questionItemText EQB_UI_Label: Question text.
Required: Mandatory if '..d:QuestionText/d:LiteralText/d:Text' is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.5.1/questionItemTextLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 1.1.5.2/questionItemTextTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)

<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..d:InstrumentScheme/d:Instrument/d:ControlConstructReference' element is present. Usage: Part of structure for the reference to the top level sequence; from there the hierarchy allows access to all sub-sequences, controlconstructs, questionconstructs and questionitems/grids. NB - 5.4 and 5.5 definitions in in the EQB Excel spreadsheet are misleading. to get from Instrument to Question, you have to follow: -From here, refer to TopLevelSequence -has reference to Sequence (for each question there is 1) -has reference to QuestionConstruct -has reference to QuestionGrid or QuestionItem
EQB_ID_Element: 5.4/referenceInstrumentToQuestion EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)

<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: This element serves four use cases. (1) Unique archival number. If no such number available, a PID may be used alternatively (and in such a case, the PID must be captured in this element *as well as* in "/ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/r:Citation/r:InternationalIdentifier/r:IdentifierContent"). The @typeOfUserID attribute must be "StudyNumber". (2) A URL or URN (a reference to a web resource that specifies its location) linking to the study description on the SP website. CDC provides a link from the study information there to the study description on the SP website, to allow users to access the data. [This element not visible in the UI, it is only needed for the link]. The @typeOfUserID attribute must be "URLServiceProvider". (3) A number of the version (free text) that the Service Provider uses to identify this version of the study. The @typeOfUserID attribute must be "Versionnumber". (4) A date of the version that the Service Provider uses to identify this version of the study. The @typeOfUserID attribute must be "Versiondate".
EQB_ID_Element: 6.3/studyNumber EQB_UI_Label: Study number/Further information on study and data/Versionnumber/Versiondate/
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Attribute Usage: Must be specifed when the "ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/r:UserID" element is used for the unique archival number. EQB_ID_Element: 6.3.1/studyNumberType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Attribute Usage: Must be specifed when the "ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/r:UserID" element is used for the URL of the study description at the SP website. EQB_ID_Element: 6.8/SPURL EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
Required: Optional ElementType: Attribute Usage: Must be specifed when the "ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/r:UserID" element is used for the date of the version that the Service Provider uses to identify this version of the study. NOT used in CDC. EQB_ID_Element: 6.4/studyVersionNumber EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Attribute Usage: Must be specifed when the "ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/r:UserID" element is used for the number of the version (free text) that the Service Provider uses to identify this version of the study. NOT used in CDC. EQB_ID_Element: 6.5/studyVersiondate EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Title of the Study (as opposed to the title of the XML document). EQB_ID_Element: 6.6/studyTitle EQB_UI_Label: Title.
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the study title. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.6.1/studyTitleLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 6.6.2/studyTitleTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Used when r:CreatorReference is a reference of a study to a person who is a principal investigator. Principal investigators are the main researchers involved in producing the data. EQB_ID_Element: 6.12/referenceStudyPerson EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Used when r:CreatorReference is a reference of a study to an organization who is a principal investigator. Principal investigators are the main institutions involved in producing the data. EQB_ID_Element: 6.13/referenceStudyOrganization EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The name of the institution publishing the metadata (at the study level) i.e. CESSDA Service Provider providing the metadata information or the name of the actual publisher of the metadata , who is not the SP. EQB_ID_Element: 6.11/publisherName EQB_UI_Label: Publisher.
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the organisation name. ISO codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.2.1/publisherNameLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Is the content of the element translated? EQB_ID_Element: 6.2.2/publisherNameTrans EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: This element refers to the date (ISO 8601) when the data of the study was or will be made publicly available. If there is an embargo on the data in effect, use the date when the embargo period ends. EQB_ID_Element: 6.10/publicationDate EQB_UI_Label: Publication date.
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Used for the study PID. PID must be one of these four types: ARK, DOI, Handle or URN. EQB_ID_Element: 6.2/studyPID EQB_UI_Label: Study PID
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Agency responsible for the persistent identifier of the study. Value should be one of https://vocabularies.cessda.eu/vocabulary/CessdaPersistentIdentifierTypes i.e. ARK or DOI or Handle or URN EQB_ID_Element: 6.2.1/studyPIDType EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A URL or URN (a reference to a web resource that specifies its location) linking to the study to a CDC page. EQB_ID_Element: 6.9/CDCURL EQB_UI_Label: Link to study in CESSDA Data Catalogue.
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The abstract for the study EQB_ID_Element: 6.7/studyDescription EQB_UI_Label: Abstract
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the abstract. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.7.1/studyDescriptionLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Subject classifcation term for the study in the local language. Use descriptive terms from https://vocabularies.cessda.eu/vocabulary/TopicClassification if possible but other vocabularies are permitted. EQB_ID_Element: 6.20.1/topicControlledDescriptive EQB_UI_Label: Topics
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if "/r:TopicalCoverage/r:Subject" element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the subject classification term. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.20.1.1/topicLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints> <MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: name of the vocabulary. If possible, use "CESSDA Topic Classification" (regardless of language) but other vocabularies are permitted. EQB_ID_Element: 6.20.2/topicName EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: The Canonical URL of the CV version that is being used e.g. https://vocabularies.cessda.eu/v2/vocabularies/TopicClassification/4.0?languageVersion=en-4.0 EQB_ID_Element: 6.20.4/topicURL EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Countries relevant to the study area EQB_ID_Element: none/none EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..r:SpatialCoverage/r:Description/r:Content' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the country label. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: none/none EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element Usage: Use this element only if the country has an ISO 3166-1 2-letter code. EQB_ID_Element: 6.16/country EQB_UI_Label: Country.
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: An identifier for the document. EQB_ID_Element: 10.1/documentID EQB_UI_Label: ID
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Type of ID for the document ID. Always 'DocumentID'. EQB_ID_Element: 10.1.1/documentIDType EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A controlled vocabulary of the type of document that is provided. EQB_ID_Element: 10.3/documentType EQB_UI_Label: Type.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: A title for the document. EQB_ID_Element: 10.2/documentTitle EQB_UI_Label: Title.
<Constraints><OptionalNodeConstraint/></Constraints>

<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: URL / Webadress of the document the metadata refer to. EQB_ID_Element: 10.4/documentURL EQB_UI_Label: displayed as hyperlink.
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Code value of the CV "DDI Time Method". Describes the time dimension of the data collection. EQB_ID_Element: 6.15.1/timeMethodControlled EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info.
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Use the string "DDI Time Method" regardless of language. EQB_ID_Element: 6.15.3/timeMethodName EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Attribute Usage: The Canonical URL of the CV version that is being used e.g. https://vocabularies.cessda.eu/v2/vocabularies/TimeMethod/1.2?languageVersion=en-1.2 EQB_ID_Element: 6.15.5/timeMethodURL EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <OptionalNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Descriptive term of Time Method CV item in the local language. EQB_ID_Element: 6.15.2/timeMethodDescriptive EQB_UI_Label: Time dimension
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'TypeofTimeMethod' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the Time Dimenstion descriptive term. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.15.2.1/timeMethodLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Type of sampling procedure used for data collection. Controlled vocabulary includes a typology of sampling methods. <Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Attribute Usage: Use the string "DDI Sampling Procedure" regardless of language. EQB_ID_Element: 6.17.3/samplingProcedureName EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Optional ElementType: Attribute Usage: The Canonical URL of the CV version that is being used e.g. https://vocabularies.cessda.eu/v2/vocabularies/SamplingProcedure/1.1?languageVersion=en-1.1 EQB_ID_Element: 6.17.5/samplingProcedureURL EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <OptionalNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Descriptive term of the Sampling Procedure CV item in the local language. EQB_ID_Element: 6.17.2/samplingProcedureDescriptive EQB_UI_Label: Sampling procedure
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'TypeOfSamplingProcedure' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the Sampling Procedure Descriptive term. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.17.2.1/samplingProcedureLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)
<Constraints> <MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Element ElementRepeatable: No Usage: Either a single point in time or start of a date range. Ideally YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format, but can accept YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM or YYYY. EQB_ID_Element: 6.19.1/dataCollectionStartdate EQB_UI_Label: Data collection period
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Element ElementRepeatable: No Usage: End of a date range. If data collection period is a single event, then this element is not required. Ideally YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format, but can accept YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM or YYYY. EQB_ID_Element: 6.19.2/dataCollectionEnddate EQB_UI_Label: Data collection period.
<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Description of the method of data collection - the procedure, technique, or mode of inquiry used to attain the data. <Constraints> <OptionalNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>

<Constraints> <RecommendedNodeConstraint/> </Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if 'TypeofModeofCollection' element is present ElementType: Attribute Usage: Language of the Mode of Data Collection descriptive term. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used. EQB_ID_Element: 6.18.2.1/modeOfCollectionLang EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info)

Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: States the type of object being referenced based on a persistent list of valid DDI object types. Always 'PhysicalInstance'. EQB_ID_Element: 4.4/referenceDatasetToStudy EQB_UI_Label: not displayed (internal info).
Required: Mandatory ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Freetext description of possibilities to access data. EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.1/dataAccess EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
Required: Mandatory if '..a:Item/a:Access/r:Description/r:Content' is present. ElementType: Attribute ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.1.1/dataAccessLang EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: If the preserved content is subject to any access restrictions, those must be expressed in as much detail as possible in the information package in accordance with cataloguing rules and metadata formats used. Examples of such restrictions are the copyright status, usage restrictions based on legislation, a license, or other agreement concerning the content usage. Should the information package contain several digital objects with different restrictions, these restrictions should be attached correctly and individually to those objects that the restrictions concern. EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.2/dataAccessCondition EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..a:Item/a:Access/a:AccessConditions/r:Content' is present. ElementType: Attribute ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.2.1/dataAccessConditionLang EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
<Constraints><MandatoryNodeIfParentPresentConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Freetext description on the metadata access conditions for the provided metadata if there is one access condition for both study- and question-related metadata. Examples of such conditions are the copyright status, usage regulations based on legislation, a license, or other agreement concerning the metadata usage. EQB_ID_Element: 11.3/metadataAccessConditionAll EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Recommended ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: Freetext description on the metadata access conditions for the provided metadata for the study-related information only. Examples of such conditions are the copyright status, usage regulations based on legislation, a license, or other agreement concerning the metadata usage. Use in conjunction with ddi:DDIInstance/s:StudyUnit/a:Archive/a:ArchiveSpecific/a:Collection/a:Item/a:CallNumber (='ZA1234' Studynumber, for example) Can also be used for Question-related access info etc. etc. Could refer to question call number from here
EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.3/metadataAccessStudy EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
<Constraints><RecommendedNodeConstraint/></Constraints>
Required: Mandatory if '..a:Collection/a:Item/a:Access/a:AccessConditions/r:Content' is present. ElementType: Content element ElementRepeatable: Yes Usage: The language of the content of the element. ISO 639-1 codes are strongly encouraged to be used
EQB_ID_Element: 6.21.3.1/metadataAccessStudyLang EQB_UI_Label: to be displayed in EQB v2.0.
